title: Ando
desc: Ando is a shell script to set up a macOS laptop for clean and simple front-end web development environment.

title: Root Directory
desc: A reference guide for house plants and how to care for them. Quickly search the directory for light, water and soil requirements, save and share your favorite plants.

title: Superior Medical Solutions
desc: A new client website built with Vue. Previously hosted on Wix.com, the client wished for a more performant and responsive site that would also integrate with Airtable.
